sourcesContent:
<template>
    <v-app-bar app>
      <!-- Menu icon for smaller screens -->
      <v-app-bar-nav-icon class="d-md-none" @click.stop="drawer = !drawer"></v-app-bar-nav-icon>
  
      <v-toolbar-title>My Store</v-toolbar-title>
  
      <v-spacer></v-spacer>
  
      <!-- Only show on medium and larger screens -->
      <router-link to="/home">
        <v-btn text class="d-none d-md-inline-flex">Home</v-btn>
      </router-link>
      <router-link to="/shop">
        <v-btn text class="d-none d-md-inline-flex">Shop</v-btn>
      </router-link>
      <router-link to="/blog">
        <v-btn text class="d-none d-md-inline-flex">Blog</v-btn>
      </router-link>
      <router-link to="/cart">
        <v-btn text class="d-none d-md-inline-flex">Cart</v-btn>
      </router-link>
  
      <!-- Menu icon for smaller screens -->
      <v-menu
        v-model="drawer"
        :close-on-content-click="false"
        offset-y
        transition="slide-y-transition"
        class="d-md-none"
      >
        <template #activator="{ on, attrs }">
          <v-btn v-bind="attrs" v-on="on" icon>
            <v-icon>mdi-dots-vertical</v-icon>
          </v-btn>
        </template>
        <v-list>
          <v-list-item v-for="item in items" :key="item.value" :to="{ path: '/' + item.value }" router>
            <v-list-item-title>{{ item.title }}</v-list-item-title>
          </v-list-item>
        </v-list>
      </v-menu>
  
      <!-- Navigation Drawer -->
      <v-navigation-drawer
        v-model="drawer"
        app
        :temporary="isTemporaryDrawer"
        :clipped="$vuetify.breakpoint.mdAndUp"
      >
        <v-list>
          <v-list-item v-for="item in items" :key="item.value" :to="{ path: '/' + item.value }" router>
            <v-list-item-title>{{ item.title }}</v-list-item-title>
          </v-list-item>
        </v-list>
      </v-navigation-drawer>
    </v-app-bar>
  </template>
  
  <script>
  export default {
    name: 'NavbarComponent',
    data() {
      return {
        drawer: false,
        items: [
          { title: 'Home', value: 'home' },
          { title: 'Shop', value: 'shop' },
          { title: 'Blog', value: 'blog' },
          { title: 'Cart', value: 'cart' },
        ],
      };
    },
    computed: {
      isTemporaryDrawer() {
        return this.$vuetify.breakpoint.isSm || this.$vuetify.breakpoint.isXs;
      },
    },
  };
  </script>
  
  <style scoped>
  .navbar-container {
    padding: 0;
    margin: 0;
  }
  </style>
